function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential spread of viruses in indoor environments due to lack of contactless systems and air purification.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Increased energy costs and greenhouse gas emissions if uv filter glass and transparent solar panels are not properly implemented.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Risk of ineffective or improper implementation of air purification systems and antimicrobial materials.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Lack of proper cleaning strategies and technologies leading to increased pathogen transmission","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Inadequate design for pandemic response leading to lack of emergency facilities and infrastructure","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Utilizing uvgi technology without proper precautions for human exposure to uv radiation","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Potential reliance on a single bio sensor for virus detection","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Implementation of plastic barriers without proper maintenance and monitoring","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Exposure to uv radiation from mobile uv devices","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Ineffective or inadequate use of bipolar ionization devices","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Failure to detect viruses in buildings","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of paint nature and endurance","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Misuse of antimicrobial particles in paints","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Improper installation or maintenance of air ionization systems","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Use of copper touch surfaces in existing buildings","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Expensive cost of copper material and maintenance","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Need for more research on indoor plant requirements","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Use of antimicrobial paint on surfaces","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Existing buildings not designed to reduce transmission of communicable diseases","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Use of smart building materials containing titanium dioxide tio2 nanoparticles for depollution","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air filtration in buildings","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Ineffective disinfection systems for pathogen control","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Potential exposure to harmful chemical disinfectants and sanitizers","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Indoor air pollution from building materials and products","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Bio composite materials as an alternative to reduce indoor air pollutants","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Nbpi may produce reactive ions and reactive oxygen species in the air, which could have unknown health effects.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Nbpi has been adopted in various types of buildings, but its effectiveness in controlling the transmission of contagious diseases like coronaviruses needs to be further studied.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Disinfectant fogging systems may pose a health risk if not properly regulated and applied, leading to exposure of building occupants to harmful chemicals.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Installation of uvgi without proper maintenance can lead to reduced effectiveness and potential health risks from exposure to uv light.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Inadequate research and regulation of air-purifying plants may lead to inconsistent efficacy and potential health risks from plant-related allergens or toxins.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Inconsistent implementation and maintenance of vertical greening systems may result in reduced air purification efficiency and potential structural damage to buildings.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Use of hygienic flooring materials such as wood, bamboo, and cork may not be effective in preventing virus spread in indoor environments","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Direct exposure to uv rays from germicidal sources can be harmful to human eyes and skin","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Insufficient disinfection of air and surfaces in indoor environments may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Use of copper-incorporated construction products and elements.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"High maintenance costs of copper materials.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Combining plastics with antimicrobial substances like copper, silver, and zinc.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Use of inappropriate hvac systems for disinfection may lead to ineffective virus control.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Survival of covid-19 virus on various materials may contribute to the spread of the virus.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation due to conflicting guidelines on co2 concentration and airflow","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Inadequate temperature and humidity control leading to virus persistence","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Limited understanding of virus deactivation requirements for hvac systems","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Ineffective air filtration systems","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Difficulty in retrofitting air filtration units with hvac systems","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Use of contactless systems","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Indoor air quality and contamination hazards","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Lack of safe physical distancing","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Non-thermal plasma technology airphx reducing viruses, bacteria, and mold by 90-99% in the air and on surfaces","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Integration of ’contactless pathways’ to reduce covid-19 disease transmission","category":"","confidence":""}]}
